contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of December, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is GRANTED to the extent it seeks mandamus relief, and the common pleas court is DIRECTED to dispose of the pending PCRA petition within 90 days.
Justice EAKIN did not participate in the decision of this matter,
